label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"鸡痘病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"口角","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"疱疹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":66,"text":"白喉性假膜","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"喉头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"食管黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡痘是由鸡痘病毒引起的各种日龄鸡的一种传染病，临床上以皮肤、口角、鸡冠等处发生疱疹为特征，有些在口腔、喉头、食管黏膜上发生白喉性假膜。

label: [{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"痘型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":43,"end":46,"text":"白喉型","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (一)流行病学特征：鸡痘一年四季均可发生，以秋、冬季节多发，而且秋季多发痘型，冬季多发白喉型。

label: [{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"中鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 各种品种、日龄、性别的鸡均有易感性，以雏鸡和中鸡最易发生，雏鸡死亡率高。病鸡是主要传染源，主要通过皮肤、黏膜的损伤接触感染；

label: [{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 也可经飞沫由呼吸道感染；蚊虫的叮咬亦可成为传播途径；

label: [{"start":43,"end":48,"text":"维生素缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 此外，饲养管理不良，如拥挤、通风不良、环境卫生条件不佳、寒冷、多雨季节、饲料配比不当、维生素缺乏或有其他疾病时，均可促进鸡痘的发生和加重病情。

label: [{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"青年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"生长发育缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"产蛋率下降","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: (二)临床症状：雏鸡、青年鸡感染鸡痘时，可导致生长发育缓慢，成年鸡产蛋率下降。因病毒感染的途径不同或侵害部位不同，其临床表现可人为地分成3种类型。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"皮肤型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":8,"text":"冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"眼睑","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"耳","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"头部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":27,"text":"结节性病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"灰色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"粟粒大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"豌豆大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":54,"text":"结节互相连接","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"厚痂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":71,"text":"破溃流出鲜血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":76,"text":"黄脂状物","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 1.皮肤型：在冠、髯、眼睑、耳等头部无毛处有结节性病灶，由灰色到灰黄色，并由粟粒大至豌豆大，有时结节互相连接，形成较大的厚痂，有时破溃流出鲜血或黄脂状物，如无继发感染，一般呈良性经过，死亡率不高。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"黏膜型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"口腔黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"喉头黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"气管黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"混浊不透明","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":46,"text":"突出于表面的小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":57,"text":"黄白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":64,"text":"干酪样坏死物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":85,"text":"出血性溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":101,"end":104,"text":"白喉型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":94,"end":96,"text":"喉头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":109,"end":110,"text":"喉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":112,"end":116,"text":"影响呼吸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":121,"end":123,"text":"张口","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":124,"end":126,"text":"伸颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":127,"end":129,"text":"摇头","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":130,"end":132,"text":"咳嗽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":135,"end":141,"text":"发出异常声音","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":144,"end":148,"text":"窒息死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":119,"end":121,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":122,"end":123,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":125,"end":126,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":128,"end":129,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":107,"end":111,"text":"阻塞喉裂","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 2.黏膜型：主要在口腔黏膜、喉头黏膜或气管黏膜上发生，灰白色、混浊不透明并突出于表面的小结节，增大后融合而呈黄白色、干酪样坏死物，像一层假膜覆盖，撕下假膜可见到出血性溃疡，此种类型常出现在喉头，故又称为白喉型，常因阻塞喉裂而影响呼吸，可见病鸡张口、伸颈、摇头或咳嗽，有时发出异常声音，甚至窒息死亡；

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"鼻咽部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":17,"text":"泪管和下眼窝发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":35,"text":"鼻窦中蓄积淡白色黏液或脓性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":35,"text":"脓性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"淡白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":51,"text":"卡他性结膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":68,"text":"脓性分泌物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":62,"text":"大量黄色黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":78,"text":"纤维蛋白性渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":84,"text":"眼睑闭合","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":84,"text":"闭合","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"下眼窝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"泪管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"鼻窦","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"眼睛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":80,"end":82,"text":"眼睑","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 当侵害鼻咽部时，则泪管和下眼窝发炎，在鼻窦中蓄积淡白色黏液或脓性分泌物；侵害眼睛时，初期呈卡他性结膜炎，进而出现大量黄色黏液或脓性分泌物，或纤维蛋白性渗出物，使眼睑闭合。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"混合型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"皮肤型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"黏膜型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"葡萄球菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 3.混合型皮肤型和黏膜型同时存在，使病情加重，严重时病鸡非常痛苦，面目全非，如不及时救护或继发葡萄球菌病，则损失惨重。

label: [{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (三)剖检变化：鸡痘仅限于临床上肉眼可见变化，当有继发感染时，可有继发疫病的特征性病变。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"特效治疗药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":20,"end":28,"text":"改善环境卫生条件","labels":["control"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"定期消毒","labels":["control"]}]
text: 因鸡痘无特效治疗药物，所以加强饲养管理，改善环境卫生条件，定期消毒等综合性措施的实施，对预防鸡痘的发生非常重要，对防止继发感染亦起重要作用。

label: [{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"鸡痘冻干苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"预防接种","labels":["control"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":101,"end":103,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":62,"end":63,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":85,"end":87,"text":"红肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":88,"end":92,"text":"炎症反应","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"鸡翅内侧","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"血管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 在临床上，常用鸡痘冻干苗作预防接种，按说明书稀释后，用消毒过的蘸水笔尖蘸取疫苗液于鸡翅内侧无血管处刺种(雏鸡刺1下，其他日龄鸡刺两下),刺后24小时抽检，检查刺种部位有无红肿等炎症反应，有者为正确，说明鸡体可以获得免疫力，无者无效，须重新接种。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":69,"end":76,"text":"局部皮下注射法","labels":["control"]}]
text: 本疫苗应在20～30日龄初免，开产前一免，其保护率是可以信赖的。在实际操作中，由于刺种的剂量难以掌握，准确性差，有时免疫效果不佳，可以改为局部皮下注射法，剂量准确，证明有效。

label: [{"start":11,"end":17,"text":"新城疫I系苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":64,"end":67,"text":"痊愈鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":73,"end":75,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":79,"end":83,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]},{"start":63,"end":72,"text":"用痊愈鸡的全血治疗","labels":["control"]}]
text: 另外，刺痘的同时不可用新城疫I系苗注射免疫，防止干扰痘苗失效，应间隔7～10天。为了减轻症状，减少痛苦，临床上多采用土法治，如用痊愈鸡的全血治疗，病鸡每只每天肌内注射0.5毫升，连用3天有效；

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"白喉型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":5,"end":12,"text":"用镊子剥离假膜","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"涂碘甘油","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"碘甘油","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 白喉型的可用镊子剥离假膜，然后涂碘甘油；

label: [{"start":1,"end":12,"text":"可用喉症丸填入鸡的口腔","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"白喉型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"皮肤型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"喉症丸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"喉症丸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"拌料","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 也可用喉症丸填入鸡的口腔内治疗白喉型；治疗皮肤型时，喉症丸2粒拌料，每只每天1次即可，连用2天；

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"喉症丸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":9,"end":17,"text":"制成糊状敷于患处","labels":["control"]}]
text: 亦可将喉症丸研碎，制成糊状敷于患处。当有继发感染时，应同时注意治疗，以缓解病情。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"痘病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":16,"text":"接触性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"痘疹","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"皮肤型鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"口角","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"翅下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡痘是由痘病毒引起的接触性传染病，特征是在口角、鸡冠、翅下等少毛或无毛处皮肤出现痘疹，一般称皮肤型鸡痘。

label: [{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"坏死性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"伪膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"白喉","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"咽喉部黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 另有一种主要在口腔和咽喉部黏膜发生坏死性炎症，形成伪膜，所以又叫“白喉”型鸡痘。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"病鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"生长缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"影响产蛋率","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":40,"text":"诱发其他传染病","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 病鸡群的病死率较低，但发病率高，可使病鸡生长缓慢，影响产蛋率，并可诱发其他传染病。如鸡群有混合感染时，可造成大批死亡。

label: [{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 夏秋季节多发，主要通过皮肤损伤传染，其中蚊虫叮咬是最主要的传播因素。

label: [{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"鸡痘病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡舍拥挤、通风不良、氨气过多、阴暗、潮湿时可促进鸡痘的发生。鸡痘病毒的传染途径是通过皮肤或黏膜的伤口侵入体内。

label: [{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 有些吸血昆虫。特别是蚊虫能够传带病毒，是鸡痘流行的一个重要传染媒介。

label: [{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"灰色小硬结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"灰色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":42,"text":"突出于皮肤表面","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 蚊虫带毒时间可以维持10~30天。病鸡发病初期在患部形成灰色小硬结节.突出于皮肤表面。

label: [{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"精神萎靡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"食欲大减","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"体重减轻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"患病雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"形成痂皮","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 1~2天后形成痂皮.一般7天后痂皮脱落，可见到明显的遗留痕迹。患病雏鸡和幼鸡精神萎靡，食欲大减，体重减轻甚至死亡。

label: [{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"眼流泪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"怕光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"眼睑粘连","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"粘连","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"失明","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"流泪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":8,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"眼睑","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 若痘长在眼上则眼流泪。怕光，眼睑粘连甚至失明。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"白喉型鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":39,"text":"口腔和咽喉部位堵塞而窒息死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"堵塞","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"窒息死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"咽喉","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 白喉型鸡痘无明显的外观症状，只表现呼吸困难，往往因口腔和咽喉部位堵塞而窒息死亡，危害较大。

label: [{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"鸡冠生长变快","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"生长变快","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"皮肤型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"白喉型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"混合型","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 主要发病在70日龄以后，鸡冠生长变快。从此到开产前后发病最多，可分为皮肤型、白喉型、混合型。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"皮肤型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肉髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"眼皮","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":30,"text":"有麸皮样覆盖物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"白色小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":57,"text":"棕褐色痘痂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"棕褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":63,"text":"形成大痂块","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (1)皮肤型。主要在冠、肉髯、眼皮等皮肤无毛处有麸皮样覆盖物，形成一种白色小结节，很快增大，互相融合变为棕褐色痘痂。形成大痂块。

label: [{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"瘢痕","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 经20~30天脱落，痂块脱落后形成瘢痕。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"白喉型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":55,"end":62,"text":"呼吸和吞咽困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"窒息死亡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":30,"text":"灰白色的豆腐样薄膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":41,"text":"覆盖在黏膜上不易剥离","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"咽喉的黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":50,"text":"不断地扩展变厚","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (2)白喉型。在口腔和咽喉的黏膜上形成一层灰白色的豆腐样薄膜，覆盖在黏膜上不易剥离，并不断地扩展变厚，导致病鸡呼吸和吞咽困难，严重时窒息死亡。

label: [{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"混合型","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (3)混合型。上述两种症状同时存在，死亡率较高。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":26,"text":"白色坏死性假膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"特殊的痘痂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"咽喉部","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 皮肤无毛处有特殊的痘痂。口腔、咽喉部有白色坏死性假膜。

label: [{"start":9,"end":22,"text":"做好平时鸡舍的卫生防疫工作","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"定期消毒","labels":["control"]}]
text: (1)预防措施。应做好平时鸡舍的卫生防疫工作，定期消毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":10,"text":"经常杀灭鸡舍中的蚊虫","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":19,"text":"避免蚊虫叮咬幼禽","labels":["control"]},{"start":20,"end":28,"text":"避免饲养密度过大","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"啄癖","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"幼禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 经常杀灭鸡舍中的蚊虫，避免蚊虫叮咬幼禽。避免饲养密度过大，以及啄癖或机械性外伤。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"饲料应全价","labels":["control"]},{"start":6,"end":14,"text":"鸡舍内通风要良好","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":24,"text":"制定科学的免疫程序","labels":["control"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"免疫接种","labels":["control"]}]
text: 饲料应全价，鸡舍内通风要良好。制定科学的免疫程序，做好鸡痘的免疫接种工作。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"隔离饲养","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"紧急接种鸡痘疫苗","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"鸡痘疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"健康的鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 将病鸡隔离饲养，假定健康的鸡紧急接种鸡痘疫苗。

label: [{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"带鸡喷雾消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 对鸡舍带鸡喷雾消毒，每日1次，连续5次，然后改为每3天1次。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"对症治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"剥除痂块","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":21,"text":"伤口处涂擦紫药水或碘酊","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"紫药水","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"碘酊","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 对症治疗可剥除痂块，伤口处涂擦紫药水或碘酊。

label: [{"start":6,"end":13,"text":"用镊子除去假膜","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":19,"text":"涂敷碘甘油","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":33,"text":"把蓄积的干酪样物挤出","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":45,"text":"硼酸液冲洗干净","labels":["control"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"碘甘油","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"硼酸液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"蛋白银液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"咽喉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"眼部","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 口腔、咽喉处用镊子除去假膜，涂敷碘甘油，眼部可把蓄积的干酪样物挤出，用2%的硼酸液冲洗干净，再滴入5%的蛋白银液。

label: [{"start":0,"end":11,"text":"饲料中添加适量维生素A","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"维生素A","labels":["drug"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 饲料中添加适量维生素A、维生素C,以提高鸡体自身的抵抗力，减少应激。

label: [{"start":0,"end":16,"text":"鸡舍内及周围用灭蚊蝇药物进行喷雾","labels":["control"]},{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"灭蚊蝇药物","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 鸡舍内及周围用灭蚊蝇药物进行喷雾，以杀灭蚊、蝇等害虫。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"鸡痘","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"鸡痘散","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"吗啉胍","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":19,"text":"鸡痘散和吗啉胍混料","labels":["control"]},{"start":34,"end":40,"text":"广普抗菌药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"环丙沙星","labels":["drug"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"蒽诺沙星","labels":["drug"]},{"start":70,"end":75,"text":"细菌性疾病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 大面积发生鸡痘时，用鸡痘散和吗啉胍混料，连用3~5天；及时适量地使用广普抗菌药物，如环丙沙星、蒽诺沙星等，连用5~7天，以防止并发或继发感染细菌性疾病。
